column1: Like many before them, the Seattle trio had used a lowly billing at the traditional August Bank Holiday beano from which to launch an assault on the cloth - ears and closed minds that run the pop establishment.

column1: ‘ Bread and jam, my dear?’ said Mrs Hollidaye as though she still had her cloth - ears on.
